pages.text: That was the strangest dream I've ever had... It's likely just nonsensical, as most dreams are, but it feels oddly real somehow. In this dream, there was a voice... A voice speaking to me... A voice that knew my name... This is roughly what the voice said:

'Those stones are powerful. Those stones are the key.' It repeated this mantra in a ghostly, otherworldly voice. Perhaps I'm simply still reeling from today's events, and the dream holds no significance. Still, I can't shake the urge to research these scarred stones.
